As far as I understand things, this is pretty much the standard look of the updated forum software. In other words, the update brought with it a new look. Still too early for me personally to form an opinion on it, but the main thing for me when reading a forum is that the text is visible, so at least that is intact ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

For those of you who were asking, the reactions button was a great idea but the problem with some of the reactions was that they could be misused. Imagine taking time to make a suggestion or a challenge etc. and someone uses the "haha" reaction as a way of digging at you. How would you feel? Then imagine if someone didn't like it that you put "confused" as a reaction to their post, so they look back at your posting history and spam everything you write with "confused" or "haha". It's a function that can cause unnecessary issues in a large community, which, as they say, is why we can't have nice things. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(")
